did.unittitle: New York Trade Union Women's Conference Audio-visual material

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York Trade Union Women's Conference

did.abstract: The folders represent a series of seminars that were held with trade union women staff and leaders which led to the First New York Trade Women's Conference in January, 1974. Preceding the formation of the Coalition of Labor Union Women.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Open reel tapes recordings from the first conference.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
